name: Hamidur Rahman
reviews: I am giving this camera 5 stars because in the very short time that I have had it, it has done everything that I expected of it. However, and having the camera do what you want it to do requires attention to set up.

name: Karim Khan
reviews: Canons until I got the 5Ds that I can I wished it was better on the iso. I bought a Sony camera and I sold a lot of cameras from canon but I had money to go for the EOS R5!

name: Kalam Gazi
reviews: The Canon R5 is my dream camera. It combines everything I love about the Canon EOS 5D Mark IV and the Canon EOS R into a single, fabulous camera.Beautiful color, amazing deal, face, and eye tracking â€” all of these tools help me to produce striking imagery without having to fixate on my gear.

name: Abdurs Salam
reviews: I am giving this camera 5 stars because in the very short time that I have had it, because the options in the set up are seemingly endless, and having the camera do what you want it to do requires attention to set up.

name: Rafiquddin Rafiq
reviews: Canons until I got the 5Ds that I can I wished it was better on the iso. I bought a Sony camera and I sold a lot of cameras from canon but I kept the 70-200 is II. I was about tho begin buying glass for the Sony until ,I had money to go for the EOS R5!

name: Abul Kalam Azad
reviews: I love this camera. Mirrorless is they way to go. The viewfinder is terrific. The files are very larger but so is the ability to crop dramatically and still get a great image. I've been using it for about 6 months with no problems. I don't shoot a lot of video, some up to 15 minutes
